-- ...................................................................... -- -- Catalog data for DocBook XML V4.1.2 .................................... -- -- File docbook.cat ..................................................... --
-- Please direct all questions, bug reports, or suggestions for changes to the docbook@lists.oasis-open.org mailing list. For more information, see http://www.oasis-open.org/. --
-- This is the catalog data file for DocBook XML V4.1.2. It is provided as a convenience in building your own catalog files. You need not use the filenames listed here, and need not use the filename method of identifying storage objects at all. See the documentation for detailed information on the files associated with the DocBook DTD. See SGML Open Technical Resolution 9401 for detailed information on supplying and using catalog data. --
-- ...................................................................... -- -- DocBook driver file .................................................. --
-- Modified for use with Cache (only locations of files have changed) -- -- csp://localhost/ prefix indicates that files are installed in Cache -- -- CSP application directory --
-- Map Arbor to OASIS --
PUBLIC "-//Arbortext//DTD DocBook XML V4.0//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/docbookx.dtd" PUBLIC "-/Arbortext/DTD DocBook XML V4.0/EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/docbookx.dtd"
PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/docbookx.dtd"
-- ...................................................................... -- -- DocBook modules ...................................................... --
PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML CALS Table Model V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/calstblx.dtd" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD XML Exchange Table Model 19990315//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/soextblx.dtd" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//ELEMENTS DocBook XML Information Pool V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/dbpoolx.mod" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//ELEMENTS DocBook XML Document Hierarchy V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/dbhierx.mod" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//ENTITIES DocBook XML Additional General Entities V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/dbgenent.mod" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//ENTITIES DocBook XML Notations V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/dbnotnx.mod" PUBLIC "-//OASIS//ENTITIES DocBook XML Character Entities V4.1.2//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/dbcentx.mod"
-- ...................................................................... -- -- ISO entity sets ...................................................... --
PUBLIC "ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Diacritical Marks//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/ent/iso-dia.ent" PUBLIC "ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Numeric and Special Graphic//EN" PUBLIC "ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Added Math Symbols: Negated Relations//EN" "csp://localhost/csp/docbook/doctypes/docbook/ent/iso-amsn.ent" PUBLIC "ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Added Math Symbols:
